channel.title: LiDAR on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in LiDAR on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for LiDAR and Photogrammetry Ground Control
item.description:
What you can do

  • Plan and stake out GCPs
  • Record positions and evidence
  • Export to GIS and processing workflows

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare targets in QGIS and collaborate with teams via QFieldCloud.
